name: gcp-cloudrun-nextjs
description: Next.js Static Site Generation and Server Side Rendering on Firebase Hosting with Google Cloud Run
author: James Hegedus

scripts.deploy: gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/nextjs-app && gcloud run deploy nextjs-app --image gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/nextjs-app --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --region=us-central1 && firebase deploy
